attributes.action: Call for a Serious Fraud Office invesitgation into corruption claims regarding Royal Albert Dock tender process
attributes.additional_details:
It is in public interest for there to be a full investigation conducted by the Serious Fraud Office, as claims of corruption have been made by Channel 4 News, regarding the tendering process of the £1bn contract for the renovation of the Royal Albert Dock.

All the details of the Channel 4 allegations can be seen here:
http://www.channel4.com/news/boris-johnson-london-propery-deal-china-albert-dock
